data.text: @AHS_media With over 9 pages of adverse reactions....my question - can I get the "life saving vaccine" removed from my system before it kills me?

@AHS_media Vaccinating for a virus/disease you don’t have a chance at getting is plain stupid! Vaccinations adults has proved to be a dangerous game of chance...STOP MAKING MONEY BY MAKING GUIENA PIGS OUT OF HUMANS!! Crimes Against Humanity is coming for you syringe plunging freaks
@IzukuMi61251360 @AHS_media Ultimately  whatever the parents choose - they are making the best decision for their child. Doesn’t make it a better parent whatever route one chooses

@IzukuMi61251360 @AHS_media 😅 the reverse can be said about the V, no long term studies & conspiracy theories coming true before our eyes. My daughter had alpha in  December 2019 (bad flu), delta august 2020 (1 day of feeling under the weather), omicron Jan 2022  (1 day of sniffles). Not planning the V.
@duszniki77 @AHS_media My kids all hv their covid vax thise who refuse to are putting their kids at risk

@AHS_media Let me assist with that information. Here is the link to Pfizer data. For kids that normally do not have severe Covid, I’d think twice before giving it to my child.

@AHS_media And if ur family physician doesn't fully inform you of the risks/reward for ur child..ask way more questions. You will likely find that your physician doesn't really have any answers. Many have not taken the time to inform themselves and know virtually nothing about the vax.
